data-definition:
-- The comments indicate the creature raw tags whose presence/absence are -- correlated with the flags. Tags with parameters, like those indicating -- biomes, are currently not listed. -- Flag names acquired from http://www.bay12forums.com/smf//index.php?topic=169696.msg8099138#msg8099138
$.layer_name
For subordinate layers:
$.token
// 0 around of, 1 around by
$.part
$.type
$.type
Index in nonsolid_layers if applicable
For blood, magma, iron men etc, lists BLOOD/MAGMA/GAS layers. For other titans and FBs, lists all layers. For ordinary, empty.
Sums of values in the parts:
(fmt "~:(~A ~A~)" $.caste_id $.caste_name[0]) $global.world.raws.creatures.all[$$].caste[$]
// temporary
fingers[2], nose, ear, head, eyes, mouth, hair, knuckles, lips, cheek, nails, f eet, arms, hands, tongue, leg
// NOT 32-bit!
-- Subset of modifiable layers, i.e. where layer_idx != -1
-- unit can be sheared at farmers if it has one u.appearance.bp_modifiers[$.bp_modifiers_idx[i]] >= $.length
muscle:
-- v0.40.01
$.token
$.creature_id
(let* ((castes $$._global.caste.*) (id $$._key) (vectors (case $ (0 $castes.body_appearance_modifiers) (1 $castes.bp_appearance.modifiers) (2 $castes.color_modifiers) (3 $castes.tissue_styles)))) (dolist (v vectors) (awhen (find-by-id v $id id) (return it))))
